levels.description: Makes an allied unit's HP unable to drop beneath 1 for 10s; afterwards, that unit automatically retreats from battle with +100% Redeployment Time
Makes an allied unit's HP unable to drop beneath 1 for 15s; afterwards, that unit automatically retreats from battle
Makes an allied unit's HP unable to drop beneath 1 for 20s; afterwards, that unit automatically retreats from battle with -50% Redeployment Time
